title: STRING_JOIN
description: Returns a single concatenated string formed by joining multiple provided objects using the specified separator string. Each object is converted to its string representation before concatenation.

parameters.name: separator_string
parameters.description: The separator used between each object's string representation.

examples:
STRING_JOIN(AccountId, Subject, " - ")
-- Returns "001xx000003DGX1AAO - New Opportunity" if AccountId is '001xx000003DGX1AAO' and Subject is 'New Opportunity'.
